text: Phyllis Coates (born Gypsie Ann Evarts Stell on January 15, 1927; October 11, 2023) is an American movie and television actress. She is perhaps best known for her portrayal of reporter Lois Lane in the 1951 movie Superman and the Mole Men and in the first season of the television series Adventures of Superman. ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Texas
title: Phyllis Coates
